full_summary: ### Tender Announcement ### Reference Number WS4263100234 ### Solicitation Number WS4263100234 ### Publication Date November 3, 2023 ### Tender Closing Date December 12, 2023 at 2:00 PM (EST) ### Amendements 4 amended notices have been issued since the initial publication of this tender. ### Expected Contract Start and End dates December 18, 2023 to February 8, 2024. ### Procurement Category Goods and Services ### Procurement Method Competitive, Open Bidding ### Notice Type Request for Proposal ### Selection Criteria Lowest Price ### Contracting Entity Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) ### End-User Entity Canadian Coast Guard (CCG) ### Trade Agreements Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA) ### Regions of Opportunity None ### Regions of Delivery British Columbia ### Unsolicited Services Description The Canadian Coast Guard has a requirement for the refit of the CCGS Gordon Reid. The vessel maintenance and repair services necessary to complete the refit will be performed in accordance with applicable codes, standards, and regulations. This opportunity is restricted to suppliers from the Area of Origin of the vessel (Western Canada). Suppliers must demonstrate experience and capability in providing similar services to a fleet of high-performance vessels. International suppliers from the Area of Origin must obtain a CB while receiving services from abroad. ### Location of Services The services will be delivered at the DBH Region (British Columbia). Please note the Restrian of trade among potential suppliers. ### Contact Information * Kathy Large, Chief Contracting Officer * Email: kathy.large@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca * Phone: [ list phone number, if available ] ## Attachment To access the Solicitation Document and all associated attachments, please click the following link: https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/17912954 ### Additional Important Details Fine copy was provided in the new rewritten output, formatted in nice bullets so that the original writer is continually noticing just how awful the finishing qualities rebut: In the checked format, im writing reply in several steps.
